Class MatrixGraph
    java.lang.Object
      AbstractGraph
        AbstractGraphExtended
          MatrixGraph
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph

    public class MatrixGraph
extends AbstractGraphExtended
    A MatrixGraph is an implementation of the Graph abstract class that uses an array to represent the edges.

      Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatrixGraph(int numV, boolean directed) Construct a graph with the specified number of vertices and directionality
